JGAL

Class GAL_RankingSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_NaturalSelector
      • JGAL.GAL_RankingSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GAL_ClassicRankingSelector, GAL_LinealRankingSelector, GAL_NonLinealRankingSelector

    public abstract class GAL_RankingSelector
extends GAL_NaturalSelector
    The GAL_RankingSelector in an abstract class wich extends from GAL_NaturalSelector.

    Subclasses of GAL_RankingSelector must provide methods for selectNewPopulation.
